name: FIXED_FORMAT_INFO
description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The FIXED_FORMAT_INFO table holds additional information not accounted for by other fields on the claim.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: FIXED_FORMAT_INFO
columns.description: This item holds additional information required for the claim that cannot be submitted in other fields.
